ca.tirtech.etchpad.drawingView.network

Class NetworkedDrawingLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.databinding.BaseObservable
      • ca.tirtech.etchpad.mvvm.LiveDataObservable
        • ca.tirtech.etchpad.drawingView.DrawingLayer
          • ca.tirtech.etchpad.drawingView.network.NetworkedDrawingLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    androidx.databinding.Observable

    public class NetworkedDrawingLayer
extends DrawingLayer
    Extension of the drawing layer allowing for changes to the layer to be propagated over the network to a connected device. This class wraps all functions provided by DrawingLayer that need to be synchronized between devices.

    This class also hosts a copy of the layer drawn on by the remote device. This class will additionally draw the remote layer whenever it is asked to draw itself. This class receives changes in the remote layer via perfomNetworkAction(String, JSONArray) and applies these to the networked layer. This class is not responsible for the maintenance of the connection. See DrawingProtocol for the networking implementation.

      • NetworkedDrawingLayer

        public NetworkedDrawingLayer(DrawingProtocol protocol,
                             DrawingLayer layer,
                             JSONObject networkedLayer)
                      throws JSONException
        Constructs an instance, initializing itself to a clone of the provided layer. Also takes the remote layer to be drawn on from the network.
        Parameters:
        protocol - the network connection
        layer - the layer to duplicate
        networkedLayer - the layer from the remote device
        Throws:
        JSONException - JSON was invalid

      • perfomNetworkAction

        public void perfomNetworkAction(java.lang.String action,
                                JSONArray value)
                         throws JSONException
        Handle a received network message with a specified action and data. Actions are performed against the networkedLayer;
        Parameters:
        action - the action to perform
        value - the data required to perform the action (may be empty)
        Throws:
        JSONException - JSON was invalid
